name: aiffnbandciffatnotciffb
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wn(wb(w0, w1))
-| wb(w0, wn(w1))
-| wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wb(w0, wn(w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wb(w0, w1))
-| wb(w0, wn(w1))
-| wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wb(w0, wn(w1)))

|- wn(wb(w0, w1))
-| wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wb(w0, wn(w1)))
-| wb(w0, w2)
-| wb(w2, wn(w1))

comment: Given a is equivalent to (not b), c is equivalent to a, there exists a proof for ( not ( c iff b ) ). (Contributed by Jarvin Udandy, 7-Sep-2016.)
